pr_title: DHFPROD-4967: Grant role to allow users to save queries

timeline.bodyText: It's fine to do this, but I think soon, we should remove all of these assertions. If the roles/privileges weren't correctly written out, that "bootstrap" would fail and none of the tests would run. So these assertions are redundant and not adding any value. Fine to keep them for now, I'll look into removing all of them soon.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.bodyText: No need to change, but you can do this in one method - loginAsTestUserWithRoles.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.bodyText: There's a helper method in AbstractMvcTest to make this a little easier, and it guarantees that the user's authenticated HttpSession is used - verifyRequestIsForbidden. Please use this instead.
